code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import usersReducer from'../reducer/usersReducer';import singleUserReducer from'../reducer/singleUserReducer';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var configureStore=function configureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({allUsers:usersReducer,user:singleUserReducer}),applyMiddleware(thunk));return store;};export default configureStore;
